title: Game Progress Route
content:
a small village with deceased bodies. Inside a house, meet Anders and select these options:

Who - or what - attacked you? What is this place? Rest easy. I'll only stay a short time.

Upon selecting the initial choice, Anders shares attack details, unveiling additional dialogue options:
